creator: Sykes, Richard (author)
description: Sykes, Richard: Resident of Stockport, England; purchased land from CPR in the Qu'Appelle Valley, and organized a colonization company, the Edgeley estate, 1882 (Hedges, Building the Canadian West). // "The Edgeley estate, the property of Mr. Richard Sykes of Edgeley near Stockport, England, was purchased in May, 1882 from the Canadian Pacific Railway Co." The estate consisted of 31 quarter sections of land.
